#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#define size 1005
using namespace std;
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
inline int getchar_unlocked()
{
	return getchar();
}
#endif
inline int input()
{
	int n = 0, c = getchar_unlocked(),t=0;
	while(c < '0' || c > '9')
	{
		if(c==45)t=1;
		c = getchar_unlocked();
	}
	while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar_unlocked();
	
	if(t==0)return n;
	else return -n;
}
int main()
{
	int T,n,k,arr[size];
	T=input();
	while(T--)
	{
		n=input();k=input();
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)arr[i]=input();
		
		vector<int>dp(k+1);
		dp[0]=1;
		int sum=0;
		bool flag=false;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			sum+=arr[i];
			for(int j=min(sum,k);j>=arr[i];j--)dp[j]+=dp[j-arr[i]];
			/*for(int j=1;j<=k;j++)cout<<dp[j]<<" ";
			cout<<endl;*/
			if(dp[k])
			{
				flag=true;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag)printf("1\n");
		else printf("0\n");		
	}
	return 0;
}
